unnormalised: So, I've been digging into this whole "Adaptive Learning" thing, and honestly, it feels like something straight outta a sci-fi Bollywood flick! Imagine, a learning system that *actually* understands where you're struggling, like that moment in 3 Idiots where Rancho figures out Chatur's just memorizing stuff.

unnormalised: Basically, adaptive learning platforms use algorithms (scary word, I know!) to personalize the learning experience for each student. Say Priya is acing her maths but struggling with English grammar. The system will automatically give her more challenging maths problems and focus on remedial grammar exercises. No more one-size-fits-all, boring textbooks!
